Class UI

java.lang.Object
UI
public class UI extends Object
This class provides a text based user interface for the player to interact with the game
Version:
student sample code
Author:
Lauren Scott

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearGame()
    clearGame To be implemented by student - this method should clear the game board and any record of moves, to reset the game The method creates a double loop to go throguh each cell of the board and resets the states of them to the initial value The stack of moves is also cleared followed by a success message.
    void
    displayGame()
    Method that displays the game for the user to play
    String
    getChoice()
    Method that gets the user's choice from the menu and conducts the activities accordingly
    void
    livesAnnouncement()
    Method that outputs an announcement when the user has lost due to lack of lives
    void
    loadGame()
    loadGame To be implemented by student - this method should load a previous saved game This method is similar with the saveGame one but this one goes through each row in the file and reads the states These states are then assigned to their respective cells based on their position in the file It also keeps track of the number of rows that were read so it matches the size of the board game Depending on the success of the function a message is displayed to inform the user
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main method within the Java application.

    saveGame()
    saveGame To be implemented by student - this method should save the current state of the game
    void
    undoMove()
    undoMove To be implemented by student - this method should undo the previous move made in the game In order for me to achieve this I created a stack to keep track of all the moves made.

    Method that outputs an announcement when the user has won the game

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()
      saveGame To be implemented by student - this method should save the current state of the game

    • undoMove

      public void undoMove()
      undoMove To be implemented by student - this method should undo the previous move made in the game In order for me to achieve this I created a stack to keep track of all the moves made.

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame()
      loadGame To be implemented by student - this method should load a previous saved game This method is similar with the saveGame one but this one goes through each row in the file and reads the states These states are then assigned to their respective cells based on their position in the file It also keeps track of the number of rows that were read so it matches the size of the board game Depending on the success of the function a message is displayed to inform the user

    • clearGame

      public void clearGame()
      clearGame To be implemented by student - this method should clear the game board and any record of moves, to reset the game The method creates a double loop to go throguh each cell of the board and resets the states of them to the initial value The stack of moves is also cleared followed by a success message.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method within the Java application. It's the core method of the program and calls all others.
